metadata.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on entering the circus area in Wyrm's Crossing.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe SAM_Get" or "oe SAM_Start"- Walk to the circus area and into the trigger S_WYR_SentientAmulet_Banter_Circus_Trigger_6f605103-66d3-4eaa-ad44-37b87b3f2b44

0.text: Ho ho, a circus! How I love the raucous revelry, the goofs and the guffaws.
